required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effect of Totum-63 on Glucose and Lipid Homeostasis in Subjects With Dysglycemia (REVERSE-IT)
clinical_study.official_title: Randomized Placebo-controlled Double-blinded Study of the Effect of TOTUM-63 on Glucose and Lipid Homeostasis in Subjects With Dysglycemia

brief_summary.textblock: This clinical study aims to assess the efficacy of TOTUM-63, a mix of 5 plant extracts, consumed at the daily regimen of three times per day on glucose and lipid homeostasis in dysglycemic subjects. The hypothesis is that TOTUM-63, consumed 3 times per day, is superior to placebo for decrease of fasting plasma glucose (FPG) concentration after 24 weeks of consumption.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)
study_design_info.masking_description: 2 blinded arms (Active 3 intakes per day and Placebo 3 intakes per day) and 1 open arm (Active 2 intakes per day)

primary_outcome.measure: Fasting plasma glucose concentration at V3 with a 3 times a day regimen
primary_outcome.description: Fasting plasma glucose concentration in mg/dL, TOTUM-63 3/day vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of the fasting plasma glucose concentration
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Fasting plasma glucose concentration (in mg/dL), TOTUM-63 3/day vs placebo, TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo and TOTUM-63 3/day pooled with TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of the HbA1c
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: HbA1c (in %), TOTUM-63 3/day vs placebo, TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo and TOTUM-63 3/day pooled with TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of the glycemia at 120 minutes following the 75g glucose intake
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention), V3 (24 weeks of intervention) and V4 (12 weeks and the end of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Glycemia (in mg/dL) at 120 minutes following the 75g glucose intake, TOTUM-63 3/day vs placebo, TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo and TOTUM-63 3/day pooled with TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo (Only for a subgroup of 201 subjects)

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of the fasting insulinemia
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Fasting insulinemia (in mU/L), TOTUM-63 3/day vs placebo, TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo and TOTUM-63 3/day pooled with TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of the HOMA-IR (HOmeostasis Model Assessment of Insulin Resistance) index
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: HOMA-IR index, TOTUM-63 3/day vs placebo, TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo and TOTUM-63 3/day pooled with TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of the HOMA-β (Homeostasis Model Assessment of Beta cells) index
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: HOMA-β index, TOTUM-63 3/day vs placebo, TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo and TOTUM-63 3/day pooled with TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of the QUICKY (QUantitative Insulin sensitivity ChecK Index) index
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: QUICKY index, TOTUM-63 3/day vs placebo, TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo and TOTUM-63 3/day pooled with TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of the fasting blood concentrations of triglycerides
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Triglycerides (in g/L), TOTUM-63 3/day vs placebo, TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo and TOTUM-63 3/day pooled with TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of the fasting blood concentrations of total cholesterol
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Total cholesterol (in g/L), TOTUM-63 3/day vs placebo, TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo and TOTUM-63 3/day pooled with TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of the fasting blood concentrations of HDL cholesterol
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: HDL cholesterol (in g/L), TOTUM-63 3/day vs placebo, TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo and TOTUM-63 3/day pooled with TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of the fasting blood concentrations of non-HDL cholesterol
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: non-HDL cholesterol (in g/L), TOTUM-63 3/day vs placebo, TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo and TOTUM-63 3/day pooled with TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of the fasting blood concentrations of LDL cholesterol
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: LDL cholesterol (in g/L), TOTUM-63 3/day vs placebo, TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo and TOTUM-63 3/day pooled with TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of the fasting blood concentrations of free fatty acids
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Free fatty acids (in g/L), TOTUM-63 3/day vs placebo, TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo and TOTUM-63 3/day pooled with TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of atherogenic index
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Atherogenic index, TOTUM-63 3/day vs placebo, TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo and TOTUM-63 3/day pooled with TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of atherogenic coefficient
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Atherogenic coefficient, TOTUM-63 3/day vs placebo, TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo and TOTUM-63 3/day pooled with TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of Cardiac risk ratio 1
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Cardiac risk ratio 1, TOTUM-63 3/day vs placebo, TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo and TOTUM-63 3/day pooled with TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of cardiac risk ratio 2
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Cardiac risk ratio 2, TOTUM-63 3/day vs placebo, TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo and TOTUM-63 3/day pooled with TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of the fasting blood concentrations of hsCRP
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: hsCRP (in mg/L), TOTUM-63 3/day vs placebo, TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo and TOTUM-63 3/day pooled with TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of the body weight
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Body weight (in kg), TOTUM-63 3/day vs placebo, TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo and TOTUM-63 3/day pooled with TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of the waist circumference
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Waist circumference (in cm), TOTUM-63 3/day vs placebo, TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo and TOTUM-63 3/day pooled with TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of the hip circumference
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Hip circumference (in cm), TOTUM-63 3/day vs placebo, TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo and TOTUM-63 3/day pooled with TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of the waist to hip ratio
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Waist to hip ratio, TOTUM-63 3/day vs placebo, TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo and TOTUM-63 3/day pooled with TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Evolution of the body composition assessed by impedancemeter
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Fat mass (in % and kg), lean mass (in % and kg), total body water (in % and kg), TOTUM-63 3/day vs placebo, TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo and TOTUM-63 3/day pooled with TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Delay of occurence of pharmacological treatment requirement for type 2 diabetes from V1
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Delay between V1 and the date at which the investigator will decide to withdraw the subject from the study because he needs a pharmacological treatment to treat his diabetes, TOTUM-63 3/day vs placebo, TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo and TOTUM-63 3/day pooled with TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo

secondary_outcome.measure: Proportion of subjects having an improvement or a deterioration of their glycemic status from V1
secondary_outcome.time_frame: V1 (baseline), V2 (12 weeks of intervention) and V3 (24 weeks of intervention)
secondary_outcome.description: Glycemic status will be defined at each visit by the FPG value, 3 different categories Type 2 diabetes/prediabetic/normal. Proportion of subjects changing from category during the study will be assessed during the study (improvement of the glycemic status or deterioration), TOTUM-63 3/day vs placebo, TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo and TOTUM-63 3/day pooled with TOTUM-63 2/day vs placebo

arm_group.description: Experimental active diet supplement TOTUM-63 taken 3 times per day (blinded arm)
Placebo comparator taken 3 times per day (blinded arm)
Experimental active diet supplement TOTUM-63 taken 2 times per day (open arm)

intervention.description: 5-g dose of TOTUM-63 diet supplement, a mix of 5 plant extracts. Eight capsules per day to consume orally in three intakes (3 in the morning, 2 at lunch and 3 at dinner)
Placebo. Eight capsules per day to consume orally in three intakes (3 in the morning, 2 at lunch and 3 at dinner)
5-g dose of TOTUM-63 diet supplement, a mix of 5 plant extracts. Eight capsules per day to consume orally in two intakes (4 in the morning and 4 at dinner)
